title: List of Texas Tech Red Raiders bowl games
summary: The Texas Tech Red Raiders football team has appeared in 38 post-season bowl games since the team's inaugural season in 1925. Texas Tech has lost its last two consecutive bowl games, and three of its last seven. Texas Tech's rich bowl tradition ranks 19th in all-time bowl appearances and has set many bowl game attendance records. The Red Raiders have an overall bowl record of 14 wins, 23 losses, and 1 tie.
